widgets.value: JS{ const fixture=@{var_fixture};let params=null;if(typeof fixture.definition!=='undefined'){params=window.Object.values(fixture.definition.parameters);}else{params=fixture.parameters} return params.find(p => p.type == 'rgbcolor'); }
